question:
You should spend about 20 minutes on this task.


You work for an international company, and would like to spend six months working in its head office in another country.
Write a letter to your manager. In your letter:


explain why you want to work in the company’s head office for six months
say how your work could be done while you are away
ask for his/her help in arranging it
text: I am writing this letter to let you know that I want to extend my internship program for another 6 months at the headquarters of the company. I have been working for your company for the last 1 year as an employee in the finances department.

Let me know in detail that I have been selected as an associated assistance manager along with the other colleagues. Therefore, they have made it compulsory for us to train under the supervised staff at their for them at their headquarters for at least 6months. Moreover, I will get experience and will become more enthusiastic in my job.

I have asked one of my friends, who is interested in doing my work in my absence. Additionally, she has 2 years of experience in finance from lords multinational company.  Furthermore, I have also asked her to update me with the daily business matters through emails. so, that it makes it easier for me to update with work.
So, I would like you to help me out with this situation and allow me to work for the period. Looking forward to your reply.
